faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We answer the most common questions about LinkedAI

q1.question: What is LinkedAI and how does it work?
q1.answer: LinkedAI is an artificial intelligence tool designed to help you create professional content for LinkedIn. It generates optimized posts, bios, and messages that increase your engagement, attract valuable connections, and boost your professional presence. Our AI creates authentic content in different tones and styles, adapted to your professional goals.

q2.question: How much does it cost to use LinkedAI?
q2.answer: We are currently in a free private launch phase. Authorized users can try the tool at no cost. Soon we will have plans starting at €12/month for basic use, €20/month for professional use, and €35/month for enterprises. All plans include a 30-day guarantee.

q3.question: How do I register for the free trial?
q3.answer: Simply enter your email in the form below. We'll add you to our waitlist and notify you when you have access. The process is completely free and with no commitment. You can cancel your participation at any time.

q4.question: What types of content can LinkedAI generate?
q4.answer: LinkedAI can generate professional posts, educational articles, inspirational content, disruptive messages, and casual conversations. It also optimizes LinkedIn bios, creates personalized connection messages, and schedules content to maintain a constant presence on the platform.

q5.question: Is it safe to use LinkedAI with my LinkedIn account?
q5.answer: Absolutely. LinkedAI does not require direct access to your LinkedIn account. We simply generate the optimized content that you can copy and paste manually into your profile. We do not store credentials or access your personal LinkedIn information.

q6.question: What results can I expect with LinkedAI?
q6.answer: Our users report an average 150% increase in engagement, saving 4 hours per week on content creation, and an average annual salary increase of €5,000. The generated content is optimized to maximize your professional visibility and effective networking.
